headline.main: EGYPTIAN LINE HIT; Auchinleck Is Engaging Three Axis Columns in Crucial Fight HE RALLIES EIGHTH ARMY Commander Calls for Supreme Effort Against Foe, Saying: 'Defeat Him We Will' ARMORED COLUMNS MEET HEAD-ON IN THE DESERT EGYPTIAN LINE HIT BY AXIS COLUMNS

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, July 1 -- Extremely heavy fighting broke out this morning as Axis armored columns attacked the British Eighth Army around El Alamein, only seventy miles west of Alexandria. The new battle, which was described as "very big," began after a comparative lull yesterday during which the Germans apparently prepared for their supreme effort to break through the British defenses and reach the Nile Delta.
abstract: Auchinleck rallies 8th army for sup effort against Rommel

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
